item.title: 无套期保值，股票投资者为更多美元之痛做好准备
item.description:
交易商越来越多地放弃了货币对冲。【原文：

Traders had increasingly given up on currency hedges. Now, that’s taking a toll. 

】

item.title: 俄罗斯拉夫罗夫竭力维护扎波罗热工厂的控制权
item.description: 俄罗斯外交部长谢尔盖-拉夫罗夫（Sergei Lavrov）表示，俄罗斯尚未收到美国关于放弃对乌克兰东南部扎波罗热核电站控制权的建议，也不可能改变该设施的所有权。【原文：Russia hasn’t received a US proposal to give up control of the Zaporizhzhia nuclear power plant in southeast Ukraine, and a change to the facility’s ownership isn’t conceivable, said Foreign Minister Sergei Lavrov.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织（IMF）暂停哥伦比亚信贷额度后，彼得罗称其为 "吸血鬼
item.description: 在国际货币基金组织暂停向哥伦比亚提供 81 亿美元的灵活信贷额度后，哥伦比亚总统古斯塔沃-彼得罗（Gustavo Petro）将矛头对准了该组织的负责人，称其为 "吸血鬼"。【原文：Colombian President Gustavo Petro took aim at the head of International Monetary Fund, referencing “vampires,” after the lender paused his nation’s access to its $8.1 billion flexible credit line.】

item.title: 特朗普的民调在接近百日大关时下滑，税收计划的风险增大
item.description: 随着唐纳德-特朗普总统的第二个任期即将迎来具有象征意义的100天，选民对其经济管理的不满正在降低他的声望，从而加大了国会共和党人通过其税收计划的压力。【原文：Voter discontent with President Donald Trump’s economic stewardship is sinking his popularity as he approaches the symbolic 100-day mark of his second term, ratcheting up pressure on congressional Republicans to pass his tax plan.】

item.title: 亚洲在规避特朗普关税的临时协议竞争中占据领先地位
item.description: 在与特朗普政府的贸易谈判中，以出口为导向、面临美国最高 "对等 "关税的亚洲经济体比西方国家走在了前面。【原文：Asian economies geared for exports and facing some of the highest US “reciprocal” tariffs are leading the way over their western counterparts in trade negotiations with the Trump administration.】

item.title: 欧洲央行准备 6 月降息，即使解决贸易问题经济也会受损
item.description: 欧洲中央银行官员正准备进一步降低利率，预计即使唐纳德-特朗普政府在未来几周内软化立场，美国关税也会对经济造成持久损害。【原文：European Central Bank officials are preparing to lower interest rates further, expecting lasting damage to the economy from US tariffs even if Donald Trump’s administration softens its stance in the weeks ahead.】

item.title: 沙特阿拉伯、卡塔尔将偿还叙利亚的世界银行债务，释放资金
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯和卡塔尔承诺偿还叙利亚欠世界银行的债务，这为叙利亚新领导层从国际贷款机构获得资金扫清了障碍，因为叙利亚正努力重振饱受战争创伤的经济。【原文：Saudi Arabia and Qatar pledged to pay Syria’s debt to the World Bank, removing one obstacle for the country’s new leadership to receive funds from the international lender as it struggles to revive its war-hit economy.】

item.title: 华尔街日报》称华为将测试功能强大的人工智能芯片，与英伟达相抗衡
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》报道，中国华为技术有限公司正准备测试一款功能强大的新型人工智能处理器，该公司希望这款处理器能够取代美国英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.【原文：China’s Huawei Technologies Co. is getting ready to test a new and powerful artificial intelligence processor that the company hopes can replace some products made by US-based Nvidia Corp., the Wall Street Journal reported.】

item.title: 欧洲央行卡扎克在经济增长前景恶化之际仍敦促采取谨慎措施
item.description: 欧洲央行理事会成员马丁斯-卡扎克认为，只有在经济增长前景进一步恶化的情况下，欧洲央行才应将利率降至宽松区间。【原文：The European Central Bank should only lower interest rates into accommodative territory if the growth outlook deteriorates much further, according to Governing Council member Martins Kazaks.】

item.title: 大科技公司的盈利问题在于预期可能过高
item.description: 上一次大科技公司发布财报时，唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）刚刚上任，股市因人们对政府促进增长议程的预期而飙升，投资者主要担心的是公司需要多长时间才能将人工智能支出转化为利润。【原文：The last time Big Tech delivered earnings, Donald Trump had just started his term, stocks were soaring on expectations of a pro-growth government agenda and investors’ main worry was how long it would take companies to convert their artificial intelligence spending into profits.】

item.title: 新兴市场蓬勃发展后，投资者将目光转向全球增长
item.description: 在特朗普执政伊始，发展中国家的资产出人意料地上涨之后，新兴市场交易商正将注意力转移到全球经济和美元的走势上。【原文：Emerging-market traders are shifting their attention to the path of the global economy and the US dollar after assets from across the developing world posted unexpected gains at the start of Trump’s administration.】

item.title: 苹果开始解散人工智能团队，对机器人和 Siri 进行调整
item.description: 苹果公司已经开始拆分其人工智能和机器学习组织，将其碎片转移到公司的其他部门。此外：Meta 力争今年推出带显示屏的智能眼镜，以及苹果计划将 iPhone 生产转移到印度的新细节。其他新闻方面，尽管苹果公司在宣传其他健康产品，但 Apple Watch 的血氧功能在美国仍然难以普及。【原文：Apple has begun breaking up its AI and machine learning organization by moving pieces to other parts of the company. Also: Meta races to get smart glasses with a display out this year and new details on Apple’s plan to shift iPhone production to India. In other news, the Apple Watch’s blood-oxygen feature remains elusive in the US even as the company touts other health offerings.】

item.title: 津巴布韦重启金币铸造，金银价格飙升至创纪录水平
item.description: 津巴布韦中央银行再次发行 10 个月前被废除的金币，以增加用于支持当地货币 ZiG 的金块储备。【原文：Zimbabwe’s central bank is again issuing gold coins it scrapped 10 months ago, a step it took to ramp up the bullion stockpile used to back up the local currency, the ZiG.】

item.title: 中国将介绍稳定就业和增长的政策
item.description: 中国将于下周一就稳定就业、确保稳定增长、促进高质量发展的政策措施举行新闻发布会。【原文：China will hold a press conference about policies and measures on stabilizing employment, ensuring stable growth and promoting high-quality development on Monday.】

item.title: 中央银行行长称以色列经济面临关税风险
item.description: 以色列央行表示，美国加征关税正在影响犹太国的经济，因为市场和科技投资面临风险。【原文：Israel’s central bank said that US-imposed tariffs are affecting the Jewish state’s economy as markets and tech investments come under risk.】

item.title: 印度央行称，尽管全球经济波动，印度经济仍将增长 6.5
item.description: 据印度中央银行称，尽管全球不确定性增加，印度经济今年仍有可能增长 6.5%，成为世界上增长最快的主要经济体。【原文：India’s economy is likely to expand 6.5% this year, making it the fastest-growing major economy in the world despite the rise in global uncertainties, according to the nation’s central bank.】

item.title: 在关税上调之前，Shein 将美国产品价格最高上调 377
item.description: 在即将对小包裹征收关税之前，快时尚巨头申银万国集团有限公司（Shein Group Ltd.）提高了其产品（从连衣裙到厨具）在美国的价格，这是贸易战对美国消费者潜在影响的早期迹象。【原文：Fast-fashion giant Shein Group Ltd. raised US prices of its products from dresses to kitchenware ahead of imminent tariffs on small parcels, in an early sign of the potential effect of the trade war on American consumers.】

item.title: 欧洲央行森特诺称不确定性主导经济分析
item.description: Jornal de Negocios》援引一篇采访报道称，欧洲中央银行管理委员会成员马里奥-森特诺（Mario Centeno）表示，目前的经济分析主要受美国贸易政策带来的 "不确定性 "影响。【原文：European Central Bank Governing Council member Mario Centeno said economic analysis is currently dominated by “uncertainty” created largely by US trade policy, Jornal de Negocios reported, citing an interview.】

item.title: PIF 的 Sanabil 支持计划在沙特上市的中东科技初创公司
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯主权财富基金的风险投资部门为技术公司 iMENA Holding 提供了 1.35 亿美元的融资支持，该公司计划在沙特阿拉伯王国进行首次公开募股。【原文：The venture capital arm of Saudi Arabia’s sovereign wealth fund has backed a $135 million fundraising round for technology firm iMENA Holding as the company plans for an initial public offering in the kingdom.】

item.title: 詹姆斯-哈迪交易后，澳大利亚证券交易所将审查上市和豁免规则
item.description: 继詹姆斯-哈迪工业公司（James Hardie Industries Plc）3 月份以 140 亿澳元（90 亿美元）收购 AZEK 公司之后，澳大利亚证券交易所将重新审查并购中的股东批准要求。【原文：The Australian Stock Exchange will review requirements for shareholder approvals in mergers and acquisitions, following James Hardie Industries Plc’s A$14 billion ($9 billion) deal in March to take over AZEK Co.】

item.title: 菲律宾中央银行称外汇干预的目标是通胀而非资本流动
item.description: 菲律宾央行表示，如果比索走软，其定期干预货币市场的目的将是遏制通胀压力，但央行并不试图管理进出该国的资本流动。【原文：The Philippine central bank said its periodic intervention in currency markets would be aimed at stemming inflationary pressures if the peso was to weaken, but that it’s not trying to manage capital flows into and out of the country.】

item.title: 大公报》报道："黄金周 "香港酒店需求旺盛
item.description: 据《大公报》报道，中国即将到来的 "黄金周 "期间，香港酒店需求旺盛，许多酒店几乎已被预订一空。【原文：Hong Kong hotels are in high demand for China’s upcoming “Golden Week,” with many already almost fully booked, Ta Kung Pao reported.】

item.title: 中国扩大外国游客退税范围以促进消费
item.description: 中国表示将降低外国人来华旅游的退税门槛，以刺激消费，同时中国政府试图抵消贸易战造成的部分损失。【原文：China said it will lower the tax rebate threshold for foreigners visiting the country, an effort to boost consumption as Beijing attempts to offset some of the damage of the trade war.】

item.title: 韩联社：韩国央行行长李明博称政策利率下调是大势所趋
item.description: 据韩联社报道，韩国央行行长李昌镛（Rhee Chang-yong）表示，由于通胀稳定，即使在货币政策上保持谨慎态度，央行关键利率的轨迹也将是走低。【原文：Bank of Korea Governor Rhee Chang-yong said the trajectory of the central bank’s key interest rate is for it to be lower because of stable inflation, even as a cautious approach is maintained on monetary policy, Yonhap News Agency reported.】

item.title: 中国 3 月份工业利润增长，不惧贸易紧张局势
item.description: 中国工业企业的利润在 3 月份出现反弹，表明在与美国贸易关系紧张的情况下经济仍有韧性。【原文：Profits at China’s industrial firms rebounded in March, signaling economic resilience amid trade tensions with the US.】

item.title: 全球基金经理不愿重返中国股市
item.description: 对于一些交易商来说，美国在中国关税问题上态度软化的迹象可能是买入亚洲国家股票的线索，但对于长期的全球基金来说，风险仍然过高，不宜扎堆入市。【原文：Signs of a softening stance from the US on China tariffs may be a cue to buy the Asian nation’s stocks for some traders, but for long-term global funds the risk is still too high to pile into the market.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织因财政问题暂停哥伦比亚灵活信贷额度
item.description: 由于缺乏减少公共赤字和债务的措施，哥伦比亚的赤字和债务增幅超出了国际货币基金组织的预期，该组织于周六暂停了哥伦比亚的灵活信贷额度。【原文：The International Monetary Fund suspended on Saturday Colombia’s flexible credit line due to the lack of measures to reduce public deficit and debt, which have risen more than expected in the fund’s eyes.】

item.title: 美国贸易谈判后智利财政部长乐观而谨慎
item.description: 智利财政部长马里奥-马塞尔（Mario Marcel）在接受采访时表示，与美国的贸易谈判已经在坚实的基础上开始，智利对此充满希望，但同时也持谨慎态度。【原文：Chile is hopeful yet cautious following trade talks with the US that have begun on solid footing, the nation’s Finance Minister Mario Marcel said in an interview.】

item.title: 美国经济在贸易阵痛来临之前就已开始衰退
item.description: 在去年的大部分时间里，这个世界最大的经济体一直保持着良好的增长势头，但在 2025 年初，随着消费者的疲惫和与关税相关的进口争夺战导致贸易赤字膨胀，这个经济体的增长速度开始下降。【原文：After cruising along comfortably for most of last year, the world’s largest economy lost altitude at the start of 2025 as consumers tired and the trade deficit ballooned on a tariff-related scramble for imports.】

item.title: 私人信贷的裂痕在动荡前就已扩大
item.description: 获得私人信用贷款的公司看起来越来越摇摆不定，银行也是最终可能要承担损失的公司之一。【原文：The companies that get private credit loans are looking increasingly wobbly and banks are among those that could eventually be on the hook for losses.】
